blocks.content: Each dashboard can contain multiple panels, each with a meaningful title that helps other users understand its purpose. After you save a dashboard, you can share it with others. Users with the appropriate permissions can edit the saved dashboard as needed.
When you've finished editing the panel, click **Save**.

In the save dialog:
1. Enter a **title** and **description** for your dashboard
2. Select a **folder** if applicable
3. Click **Save**
Click **Back to dashboard** to return to the dashboard view.
Click **Exit edit** to leave edit mode and view your completed dashboard.
ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations! You've successfully created a dashboard with a logs visualization. Your dashboard is now saved and ready to share with your team.
